item.description:
Deepen Your Healing Practice
For Reiki Practitioners or anyone in the healing arts
Saturday, Feb. 11, 9- noon. $44

Take your healing practice to the next level to help your clients move deeply into their healing process through techniques that blend well with any healing session.
-How chakras correlate with emotional states; how to align your energy and access protection; invoke angelic presence; use a pendulum to check chakras; learn a shamanic practice of chakra clearing; alternative hand positions to invoke safety and love; use crystals to clear the auric field; enjoy practice time and community.

In this class you will receive the Healer's Rite - one of the rites of the Munay-Ki (www.Munay-Ki.org) the Healer's Rite connects you to a lineage of luminous beings from the past, who assist you in your personal transformation. Awakens the healing power in your hands so everyone you touch is blessed.
item.name: Deepening your healing practice - for Reiki practitioners and others in healing
